description.en-US: Get easy access to a package tracking tool and custom web search with the Package Tracking Tab & Custom Web Search browser extension. Convenient online tracking Track domestic and international parcels shipped via a widget on your browser. Put an end to waiting - know when to expect delivery. Customized web search Browse the web conveniently with access to Yahoo® search. Search for videos, shop online & more. This add-on uses Yahoo as a search provider. You can uninstall this extension if you no longer need it. Please share your feedback with us so we can work on improving the extension experience. You agree to install this extension and abide by the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy by clicking on the button above. Yahoo is a registered trademark of Apollo Global Management, Inc. Our Privacy Policy: Packagetrackingtab.com is a product offered by Innover Group. We provide users with ease of access to information and widgets from their browser. Our Privacy Policy is important for us to continue providing the users with the best possible all-round experience. Here’s a summary of user data that our add-on collects and how we use this information: 1. IP address: We collect your IP address when you use the package tracking and shipping quote calculator related tool offered by our extension. We anonymise your IP address and do not trace it back to you. We only use this for analytics and reporting purposes. You can opt-out of sharing the above information with us, however, you will only be able to access limited features. 2.Technical data: Technical information (such as domain name and user agent ) is also collected by the add-on to plan product upgrades and help with fraud detection. This data is not personally identifiable and is used for optimization purposes and cannot be used to identify users. 3. Information you explicitly share with us: We may collect information that you may choose to provide us (such as your name, telephone number and/or email address) if submitted by you as part of a feedback form, crash report, enhancement suggestion or other communication from you to us. This information is only used to respond to user queries or concerns and will not be shared with any third party. You agree to install this extension and abide by the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy by clicking on the button above. Privacy Policy: https://packagetrackingtab.com/packagetracker/privacypolicy_ff.html Terms of Service: https://packagetrackingtab.com/packagetracker/termsofservice_ff.html

name.en-US: Package Tracking Tab & Custom Web Search

summary.en-US: Add the Package Tracking Tab & Custom Web Search extension to track packages online by clicking the favicon on the toolbar & enjoy access to Yahoo® search from your browser.
